title: RTP typeface
content:
I thought this was custom but now we see it used quite more often on the Portuguese public Television (with some OMG CAPS + FF din on some shows).   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121134722im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48041.gif)

 [‹ Ionic Shaded?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121134722/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44689 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ugh--'six minutes of safety' Ugly, but I need the I.D.'s anyway! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121134722/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44674 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adriano

comments.content:
I don't think these two come from the same font, RTP could be a custom logo ( [CA Aircona](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121134722/http:/www.cape-arcona.com/) is close).   
   
The second line I don't now but reminds me a semi-squooshed version of M

Is defenitly a customized version of Morgan Big, form Feliciano Type Foundry.  
 [http://www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page\_id=18](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121134722/http:/www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page_id=18 "http://www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page\_id=18")
